subtitle: This wonderful summer soup is served chilled.

method.text: Place all the ingredients in a pan. Bring to the boil then cover and simmer for 10-15-min. Allow to cool.
Blend in a food processor or blender until smooth. Pour into a bowl, cover with cling film and chill until ready to serve.
Pour into serving bowls. Garnish with a swirl of soured cream.

title: Chilled cherry soup
